name: HTTPCookieStringPolicy
desc: Values that indicate whether to restrict the cookie to requests sent back to the same site that created it.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates an HTTP cookie string policy from the given raw string.

items.name: static let sameSiteStrict: HTTPCookieStringPolicy
items.desc: A policy that prohibits a cross-site request from including the cookie.

items.name: static let sameSiteLax: HTTPCookieStringPolicy
items.desc: A policy that allows certain cross-site requests to include the cookie.
